pages.title: Semi-permeable Glass
pages.text: For a long time now, those annoying monsters that always appear at night are no longer a threat to you and only serve as a resource supplier, if at all. But that doesn't stop them from pursuing you further.$(br)You spend more time keeping those pesky monsters out of your base than you care to admit.$()

Then you remember the $(l:decoration/gemstone_glass)Gemstone Glass recipe$(/l) you thought up earlier.$(br2)With a bit of magical energy, it should be no problem to make it not only transparent, but also passable for you (not for them!).$(br2)Bonus: If you make it look exactly like regular glass you might even be able to fool your competition.$()

pages.title: Simple Variant
pages.text: While it looks exactly like its $(l:decoration/gemstone_glass)mundane counterpart$(), only players can pass through it. All other creatures will bounce, like a fly off a window.

pages.title: Gemstone Variant
pages.text: Semi-permeable Glass comes in all gemstone colors. Simply replace the $(item)Amethyst$() with the gem of your choice.
